definitions.definition: A flavored, creamy sugar preparation, used for icing cakes or as a base for candies .
A candy or cake filled with such a preparation.
A sugar dough , usually prepared as large sheets ( rolled fondant ), used in place of icing to cover large areas of cakes, composed of sugar, water, gelatin , glycerine .
The base or flux, in enamel, which is colored throughout by metallic oxide while in a state of fusion.

main_definition: ( usually uncountable ) A flavored, creamy sugar preparation, used for icing cakes or as a base for candies .
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) A candy or cake filled with such a preparation.
( food ) A sugar dough , usually prepared as large sheets ( rolled fondant ), used in place of icing to cover large areas of cakes, composed of sugar, water, gelatin , glycerine .
( usually uncountable ) The base or flux, in enamel, which is colored throughout by metallic oxide while in a state of fusion.
( slang ) Facial makeup (cosmetics), when used excessively.
